description: Moodle is the worldâ€™s most popular open-source learning management system (LMS). The community edition of Moodle allows educators to create flexible, customizable online learning platforms with extensive plugin support, user management, and activity tracking.

notes.text: Database and Admin credentials are saved in ~/moodle.creds
Moodle requires PHP settings: max_input_vars >= 5000 and memory_limit >= 256M. These are applied automatically.
Supports MariaDB as the database backend (configured by the script).
